movies.anecdotes:
Thomas Cailley cut a 2 minutes epilogue between the film's screening at the Cannes film festival and its official release.
According to him, "in the end [he] felt like it was more interesting not to answer all the questions that the epilogue answered. To leave them open."Guide the Waywritten by Bethanie Aggett, Lawrence Max Gale Hayes, Louis David Greenwood

movies.anecdotes: There is an endless "bongo drum" music track layered over the entirety of the cartoon's English version, even when other music is being played.The audio is out of sync with the visuals even more so than in other English-language versions of Dingo Pictures cartoons. All of the voice acting was done by one person, and very rarely do his lines correspond to the mouth movements of the characters.Featured in Phelous & the Movies: Animal Soccer World (Dingo Pictures) (2019)

movies.title: Rémi sans famille
movies.summary: A compelling story in which orphaned Remi gets hired out to a traveling street entertainer Vitalis when her foster parents fall on hard times.
movies.anecdotes: In 1996, a new adaptation of this story was aired in Japan. Remi, Nobody's Girl (Ie Naki Ko Remi) was created by Nippon Animation as part of their famous World Masterpiece Theater series.Finnish version is edited into a made-for-television movie.Referenced in Nicky Larson et le parfum de Cupidon (2018)Saa Aruki Hajime You(Opening Theme)Music by Takeo WatanabePerformed by Ayako Sawada

movies.title: Animals
movies.summary: Brahim est un jeune homme, la joie de sa mère. Un jour, il trouvera l'amour de sa vie. Il deviendra un père de famille, il rendra tout le monde fier. Un jour, il sera mûr et épanoui. Un jour...
movies.anecdotes: Inspired by the homophobic murder of 32-year-old Ihsane Jarfi on April 22, 2012 in Liege, Belgium. Jarfi was beaten to death by four men. His naked body was found in a field two weeks later with 17 rib fractures, among other severe injuries. Three of the murderers were sentenced to life in prison and the fourth murderer was sentenced to 30 years in prison.

movies.title: Animal 2
movies.summary: James "Animal" Allen (Ving Rhames) took the fall for the crimes of his older son (Vicellous Shannon) and is now serving a life term at Folsom Prison.

movies.title: Political Animals
movies.summary: Une ancienne Première Dame divorcée occupe actuellement le poste de secrétaire d'État. Elle s'occupe des problèmes du Département d'État tout en essayant de garder sa famille unie.
movies.anecdotes: Actors Sebastian Stan and Dylan Baker also starred together in cancelled TV series, Kings (2009), where Stan also played a gay character.Featured in Chelsea Lately: Épisode #6.109 (2012)

movies.title: Les animaux du bois des Quat'Sous
movies.summary: A group of wild animal friends are forced to move to a park after humans drive them away from their old home.
movies.anecdotes: The episodes were alternately animated in Britain and in France.Vehicles are seen driving on the right throughout the series. Traffic keeps to the left on British roads.Mr Rabbit: Do you remember when my throat was so sore, I couldn't talk at all?Mrs Rabbit: Yes, dear. It was lovely.Edited into Journey Home: The Animals of Farthing Wood (1996)
